item.title: SQLook - SQLite Database Viewer and Generator
item.description:
SQLook - SQLite Database Viewer and Generator

SQLook - A free online SQLite database manager with visual query builder. Create, view, and query SQLite databases directly in your browser. Features include visual table generation, sample data population, query assistance, and database visualization.
SQLook is a powerful web-based SQLite database manager that runs entirely in your browser. No installation or server required - just open your SQLite databases and start working with them immediately.
item.content:encoded:
SQLook - SQLite Database Viewer and Generator

SQLook - A free online SQLite database manager with visual query builder. Create, view, and query SQLite databases directly in your browser. Features include visual table generation, sample data population, query assistance, and database visualization.
SQLook is a powerful web-based SQLite database manager that runs entirely in your browser. No installation or server required - just open your SQLite databases and start working with them immediately.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JJJJXDB3HFJNRXD35RBVE3DT
item.description:
ComfyUI running in Docker is an ideal self-hosted AI image generator: noted.lol/∞

This might persuade me to upgrade to more powerful hardware in the future. However, I’m not a fan of the bulkiness and the amount of space it takes up on my desk (or in my house in general).
item.content:encoded:
ComfyUI running in Docker is an ideal self-hosted AI image generator: noted.lol/∞

This might persuade me to upgrade to more powerful hardware in the future. However, I’m not a fan of the bulkiness and the amount of space it takes up on my desk (or in my house in general).

item.title: Usage limits in Todoist
item.description:
Usage limits in Todoist

Some usage limits depend on your plan, while others apply to everyone. In this article, you can find everything about your general account limits, and the limits that are increased when you upgrade to Todoist Pro or Todoist Business.
These are the Todoist limits, for free and pro plans, for your consideration.
item.content:encoded:
Usage limits in Todoist

Some usage limits depend on your plan, while others apply to everyone. In this article, you can find everything about your general account limits, and the limits that are increased when you upgrade to Todoist Pro or Todoist Business.
These are the Todoist limits, for free and pro plans, for your consideration.

item.title: D-Tale The Best Library To Perform Exploratory Data Analysis Using Single Line Of Code
item.description:
D-Tale The Best Library To Perform Exploratory Data Analysis Using Single Line Of Code

In this video I am going to discuss about pandas visual analysis where we will perform EDA in a single line of code.
More study materials about Python, data analysis, and D-Tale.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JJ8TNEPYQ71ZFKY57TAHM61P
item.description: @jleverenz I used to keep coming back to #RememberTheMilk for a very long time. But I think now I’m ready to move on to #Todoist. Their API is more robust, and the documentation is aplenty.
item.content:encoded: @jleverenz I used to keep coming back to #RememberTheMilk for a very long time. But I think now I’m ready to move on to #Todoist. Their API is more robust, and the documentation is aplenty.
